name: SANITY
description:
Sanity. Can you keep yours?

Your new wife and you have it all. A new home. A new marriage. Supportive parents on both sides.

Until your life is turned upside down.

SANITY is a first-person psychological horror game, inspired by the minds of David Lynch, Ari Aster, and Nicholas Roeg. Your story is directly affected by the choices and interactions with yourself and those around you.

The choice is yours. Can you keep your sanity?
